this_title: Long Train Running: A History of the Oakland Blues
trans_title: 长路漫漫：奥克兰蓝调的历史
introduction: 马龙·里格斯的毕业作品。Marlon Riggs and Peter Webster's thesis project reflects on the heyday of Oakland blues in the late 1940s and '50s, when an influx of African American shipyard workers mostly hailing from Louisiana and Texas arrived in the Bay Area. Combining vintage photographs, archival footage, interviews, and performances at venues like Eli's Mile High Club, Riggs and Webster chronicle Oakland's vibrant past while revealing an uncertain present.
chinese_title: 长路漫漫：奥克兰蓝调的历史
foreign_title: Long Train Running: A History of the Oakland Blues
